attributes.action: malmute to be put to sleep for no good reason
attributes.additional_details:
A 18 month old Malmute is going to be put to sleep this weekend if the kennels cannot find him a home?!
Bailey's only flaw is that he is food aggressive with other dogs and his previous owner insists that if he didn't already have two other dogs, Bailey would have been perfect.
All he needs is training and separate feeding from other dogs.
Lets save this pup and find him a loving home
